title: OpenJS Foundation Collaboration
summary: Members of the OpenJS Foundation cross project council would like to propose a 'BoF' conversation about how to build and strengthen healthy collaborations between foundation projects and W3C groups.
goals: Discuss efforts underway in the foundation to recruit participation from our project communities into various W3C efforts.
Discuss opportunities for cross-org collaboration. Highlight areas where OpenJSF projects would be additive to W3C.
